author: Simon Difford
description: Orange fruitiness fortified with cognac and white rum. Fruity but not a sweetie.
name: Bull's Blood
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
